committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for the annual collection and publication of world population statistics and data.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to collect, analyze, and publish current world population statistics at least annually. Specifies the information which is to be included in such report. Directs the Secretary to delegate such responsibilities to the International Statistical Program Center, to be carried out under the direction of the Director of the Census.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for the annual collection and publication of world population statistics and data.
